attributes.action: A Pedestrian crossing at murlough beach
attributes.additional_details: This could potentially save a life.
attributes.background: I want there to be a pedestrian crossing put from the carpark at murlough across the road as it is a dangerous road to cross because its quite wide and due to a poor child (8 years old) that was knocked over it is definitely needed.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
